channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
I still need help finding out where I can edit my shops to put items in them. I don't know where to look, some people told me a file that my client/source don't even have.... Can anyone help?
Also, when I enter the pkp shop, the items don't have numbers over them, which I think states they are unlimited. So when I take one, the number = 0 but I can still get some of the items. Is there a way I can make this so it just stays without a number?

@dzeko wrote:

or

PI

??

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Well if ur using delta 317,. In ur source there a folder called config. Then in that there’s "shops.cfg.

For PI the file is the same

Read full topic

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @Speakmore Speakmore
item.description:
@Speakmore wrote:

I still need help finding out where I can edit my shops to put items in them. I don’t know where to look, some people told me a file that my client/source don’t even have…
Can anyone help?

Also, when I enter the pkp shop, the items don’t have numbers over them, which I think states they are unlimited. So when I take one, the number = 0 but I can still get some of the items. Is there a way I can make this so it just stays without a number?
